keyword: calories in a 6 piece chicken mcnugget
title: Calories in a 6-Piece Chicken McNugget
meta_description: Discover calories in a 6 piece chicken mcnugget, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, standard breaded and fried; no dipping sauce or sides included; based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and custom orders. Check McDonald's app or packaging for the most current info.

quick_answer.text: A 6-piece Chicken McNugget serving provides ~250 kcal and 14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken McNugget?
What is the protein in a 6-piece Chicken McNugget?
Are Chicken McNuggets high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, a 6-piece serving has ~560 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Do Chicken McNuggets have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat; total fat is 16 g per 6 pieces.

faqs.q: How do sauces affect calories in a 6 piece chicken mcnugget?
faqs.a: Sauces add 40-50 kcal per packet; choose wisely for lower totals.
